messages.text: {{NAME}}, 15-min call to cut CAC 20% and lift LTV. 30-day ROI or you pay $0. Interested?
{{NAME}}, we automate top 3 manual steps and free 20% SDR time. Pilot shows ROI in 2 weeks. Time to chat?
{{NAME}}, want a 90-day plan to reduce churn 10% and grow NRR? We'll bring the model and data. When works?
{{NAME}}, we add pipeline without extra headcount. Payback <60 days. Open to a quick review?
{{NAME}}, let's find 5 quick wins to add $500k ARR this quarter. No commit; pilot first. Up for it?
{{NAME}}, cut unit costs 12% by fixing leakage you already pay for. I'll show the math. 20-min?
{{NAME}}, ship faster and reduce rework 25% with our QA layer. Risk-free pilot. Want details?
{{NAME}}, CFOs choose us for clear ROI: margins up, CAC down. Can I send a 1-page case?
{{NAME}}, we recover 3-7% revenue lost in billing errors. Zero lift for your team. Talk this week?
{{NAME}}, if we can't prove 5x ROI, we walk. If we can, you scale. Explore for 15 minutes?
